Address.label: Address
Address.value: NO. 8 SONGGANG ROAD, CHANGXING STREET,XIAOPENG AUTOMOBILE, CENCUN, GUANGZHOU, 510640, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: XPeng Inc is a Smart Electric Vehicle company designing, developing, manufacturing and marketing smart electric vehicles in China. The company manufactures environmentally friendly vehicles, namely an SUV (the G3) and a four-door sports sedan (the P7). It targets the mid- to high-end segment in China's passenger vehicle market.
